name: 蔡子萱
objective:
本課程介紹粒子物理作用與化學現象間的關係，並討論相平衡、化學平衡、電化學、氫原子模型、反應速率等的觀念，主要教學內容包括氣體行為、基礎熱力學、基礎量子力學、化學動力學及電化學等重要理論。
This course explores the relationship between particle physics interactions and chemical phenomena, covering key concepts such as phase equilibrium, chemical equilibrium, electrochemistry, the hydrogen atom model, and reaction rates. The main instructional content includes important theories such as gas behavior, fundamental thermodynamics, basic quantum mechanics, chemical kinetics, and electrochemistry.
schedule:
Week 01-02：Gas laws & the Kinetic Theory of Gases
Week 03-04：The Laws of Thermodynamics
Week 05-06：Gibbs Energy and Chemical Potential
Week 07-08：Quantum Mechanics
Week 09-10：Phase Equilibrium
Week 11-12：Chemical Equilibrium
Week 13-14：Electrochemical Equilibrium
Week 15-16：Chemical Kinetics
Week 17-18：Essential Math for Physical Chemistry
scorePolicy:
Midterm Exam 35-40%
Final Exam 35-40%
Others (Homework, Exercise in-class & Attendance, etc.) 20-30%
materials:
Textbook:
David W Ball, Essentials of Physical Chemistry, Thomson 2014.

Reference
P. Atkins; J. de Paula, J. Keeler, Atkins’ Physical Chemistry, 12/e, 2023.
